Package com.github.uberroot.ncjbot.api

This package contains the API for building applications on top of NCJBot.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    JobEnvironment.JobStateListener
    This interface provides callbacks for events related to the state of the LocalJob.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JobEnvironment
    This class is used to run and manage individual LocalJobs.
    LocalJob
    This abstract class provides the interface between external code and the node.
    LocalNode
    A public-safe wrapper for LocalNode.
    OverlayManager
    A public-safe wrapper for OverlayManager.
    Watchdog Deprecated
    This entire class will be removed from the public API and it's functionality will be provided automatically.

Package com.github.uberroot.ncjbot.api Description

This package contains the API for building applications on top of NCJBot.

Author:
Carter Waxman
